body.p:
Office Ky Penty April 13th 61
To His Excellency Govenor
B MaGoffin.

John W Larke was sent here from Carter county for Burglary for three years April term 1858 Recd April 16th 1858. time Expires tomorrow. Says he got Drunk and done the Deed and they done right in Sending him here. He has conducted him self verry well since he has bee here. and promises to Do better here after. and has been begging me to see you and get you to Pardon him. I Send you this and you can do as you think best

Carter Cir. Ct
Jno. W. ClarkeLarke
